product_name: Potable Aqua Iodine and Taste-Neutralizer Tablets
long_description: Potable Aqua iodine tablets kill bacteria, viruses and giardia while taste-neutralizing tablets help rid treated water of the iodine taste. Iodine tablets make most water bacteriologically suitable for drinking, while neutralizing tablets neutralize taste, odor and color. Each bottle includes 50 tablets; 2 iodine tablets treat 1 quart of water. Each iodine tablet contains 20mg of tetraglycine hydroperiodide, which releases 8 ppm of titratable iodine. Potable Aqua tablets require that you wait at least 30 min. before drinking the treated water. Unopened bottles of Potable Aqua tablets should remain effective up to 4 years when maintained under controlled temperatures between 60 and 86degF. An opened bottle of Potable Aqua should not be kept for more than 1 year. Caution: Iodine tablets are not effective against.
short_description: Potable Aqua iodine tablets kill bacteria, viruses and giardia while taste-neutralizing tablets help rid treated water of the iodine taste.
